info.name: Marvel Terraria Universe
info.description: A Terraria mod that adds transformations into super heroes, as well as many settings, events, objects, and mechanics from the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

info.name: Lifted Difficulty Limitations
info.description: A Terraria mod that allows Journey Mode characters to enter non-Journey Mode worlds and non-Journey Mode characters to enter Journey Mode worlds.

info.name: Character Loadouts
info.description: A Terraria mod that allows the player to select a premade loadout on character creation, which appears with the newly-made character upon joining a world.

info.name: Dynamic DCU
info.description: A Terraria mod that changes the way the Drill Containment Unit works, making its pickaxe / axe / hammer power dependant on whatever tools are present in the player's inventory.

info.name: Every Weapon Is A Tool
info.description: A Terraria mod that gives weapons and player-made projectiles the ability to mine tiles and walls.

info.name: No More Pillars
info.description: A Terraria mod that removes the Lunar Invasion event and the bosses / enemies associated with it, granting the player Lunar Fragments as Lunatic Cultist drops.

info.name: Achievement Trees
info.description: A Terraria mod that changes the way achievements are presented ingame, making a world-specific GUI that can be followed like a tree, similar to the Minecraft Advancement menus.

info.name: All In One Crafting
info.description: A Terraria mod that allows the player to use crafting stations without having to place them down, being able to keep them in special designated item slots.

info.name: Auto Hole Filler
info.description: A Terraria mod that adds a throwable bomb that fills up any hole it's thrown into, using the surrounding tiles to mimic the terrain.

info.name: Terraria Dating Simulator
info.description: A Terraria mod that allows the player to date Town NPCs. Enough said.

info.name: Mario Land Mod
info.description: A Terraria mod that adds transformations into characters, as well as many enemies, Power-Ups, objects, and mechanics from the Super Mario Bros. series of games.

info.name: Torture
info.description: A Terraria mod that absolutely tortures the player audibly, visibly, and emotionally...

info.name: Versatile Cell Phone
info.description: A Terraria mod that changes the Cell Phone into a GTA-style mobile phone, capable of many unique functions.

info.name: 2048 In Console
info.description: A Python script that allows the user to play 2048 in the console.

info.name: Hangman Expert
info.description: A Python script that emulates a game of hangman, wherein the program uses several algorithms to try to guess the word in the least amount of turns.

info.name: Lagrange Challenge
info.description: A Python script that uses Lagrangian interpolation to derive the simplest function curve that goes through a set of given points.

info.name: Shove-It In Console
info.description: A Python script that allows the user to play Shove-It in the console.

info.name: Snake In Console
info.description: A Python script that allows the user to play Snake in the console.

info.name: Tetris In Console
info.description: A Python script that allows the user to play Tetris in the console.

info.name: 7-Segment Sign
info.description: A Javascript program that displays a given word using 7 segments, mimicing the look and limitations of 7-segment displays.

info.name: TCreator
info.description: A desktop application written in ElectronJS that uses Visual Scripting and a WYSIWYG Drag n' Drop system to make creating Terraria mods simpler.

info.name: Sequence Memory Game
info.description: An unpublished iOS app written in Swift that allows the user to play a sequential memory game.

info.name: Virtual Library
info.description: A Python program that mimics the functions of a typical library, allowing the user to make an account, add, borrow, and return books.

info.name: Randomizer
info.description: A Discord bot made with Discord.JS that provides random things from many categories.
